title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend with LangChain abstractions.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, manage models, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, model management, and Spring Boot starters.

title: OllamaSharp
summary: .NET library and CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API; supports chat, generate, and embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for interacting with Ollama: chat, completions, and model operations.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI that adds interactive chat, conversation history, and prompt templates on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding assistant with explain/refactor actions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Redis, and GPU runtime presets.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function calling, and deploying Ollama at scale.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation that builds Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Streamlit app that performs RAG over local documents using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that serves Ollama models in chat channels with role-based access and per-guild configs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your vault for summarization and idea generation.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with thread support.
